meanings.definition: The state or condition of being nebulous.
meanings.sent1: The nebulosities in the sky made it hard to see the stars clearly.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the nebulosities of the clouds in their painting.
meanings.sent3: The nebulosities in the fog seemed to dance and swirl around us.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was filled with nebulosities, making it difficult to focus.
meanings.sent5: The nebulosities of his memories slowly faded with time.

meanings.sent1: The nebulosities sky hinted at a coming storm.
meanings.sent2: The glass had a nebulosities texture, distorting the view.
meanings.sent3: The nebulosities morning air made everything feel dreamy.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were tired, making the world appear nebulosities.
meanings.sent5: The nebulosities mist enveloped the forest in mystery.

meanings.sent1: His nebulosities explanation left us all confused.
meanings.sent2: The nebulosities instructions were hard to follow.
meanings.sent3: The nebulosities plan seemed doomed from the start.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of that day were nebulosities and fleeting.
meanings.sent5: The nebulosities figure in the distance slowly came into focus.
